svad:
This property verifies that the rATOM signal is assigned to 0 one clock cycle after the active-high reset signal grst is asserted.

The verification occurs on every positive edge of the gclk clock, but is disabled when grst is 0. When grst becomes 1, the property requires that on the very next clock cycle, rATOM must equal 0.
